title: Tom Brady's suspension reinstated & Bradford requests trade
itunes:title: Tom Brady's suspension reinstated & Bradford requests trade
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Colleen Wolfe discuss the latest news from the NFL, including the return of Deflategate saga and Josh Norman signing with the Redskins. Then, the heroes preview the 2016 NFL Draft and dive into the draft edition of “Go Get My Lunch!”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
